headline: ‘The brand is so toxic’: Dems fear extinction in rural US
author: Associated Press
sentences: The party’s brand is so toxic in the small towns 100 miles northeast of Pittsburgh that some liberals have removed bumper stickers and yard signs and refuse to acknowledge their party affiliation publicly.
These Democrats are used to being outnumbered by the local Republican majority, but as their numbers continue to dwindle, t ...
SMETHPORT, Pa. (AP) — Some Democrats here in rural Pennsylvania are afraid to tell you they’re Democrats.
